title: Software Engineer
description: TechCo Japan is seeking a talented Software Engineer to join our dynamic team in Tokyo. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining high-quality software solutions for our clients.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. Proficiency in Java, JavaScript, or Python. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a team environment.

title: Marketing Specialist
description: Join our global marketing team in Osaka! We are looking for a creative and driven Marketing Specialist to develop and execute marketing strategies for our clients.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field. Proven experience in digital marketing, SEO, and social media management. Excellent communication and analytical skills.

title: English Teacher
description: Become part of our dedicated team at an international school in Kyoto! We are seeking passionate and qualified English Teachers to inspire and educate students.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Education or related field. TEFL or TESOL certification. Native or near-native English proficiency. Previous teaching experience preferred.

title: Frontend Developer
description: WebTech Japan is looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to join our team in Tokyo. You will collaborate with designers and backend developers to create user-friendly web applications.
requirements: Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experience with modern frontend frameworks such as React or Vue.js. Good understanding of responsive design principles.

title: Financial Analyst
description: Finance Solutions Inc. is seeking a detail-oriented Financial Analyst to join our team in Tokyo. You will be responsible for financial modeling, analysis, and reporting to support decision-making.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field. Strong analytical skills and proficiency in Excel. Knowledge of financial principles and accounting standards.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Join our creative team in Osaka! We are looking for a talented Graphic Designer to create engaging visual content for our clients' marketing campaigns.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or related field. Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign). Strong portfolio showcasing creative design work.

title: English Editor
description: Publishing House Japan is seeking an experienced English Editor to join our editorial team in Tokyo. You will edit and proofread English manuscripts for publication.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, or related field. Excellent command of English grammar and writing. Previous editing experience preferred.

title: Sales Representative
description: Tech Solutions Co. is expanding its sales team in Fukuoka! We are looking for motivated Sales Representatives to promote our products and services to clients.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field. Proven sales experience and strong negotiation skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

title: Human Resources Manager
description: Global Corporation Japan is seeking a dynamic Human Resources Manager to lead our HR department in Nagoya. You will oversee recruitment, training, and employee relations.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources Management or related field. Proven experience in HR management. Knowledge of labor laws and regulations in Japan.

title: Customer Support Specialist
description: E-commerce Japan is hiring Customer Support Specialists in Sapporo! Join our team and provide exceptional customer service to our online shoppers.
requirements: High school diploma or equivalent. Excellent communication skills and customer service orientation. Ability to multitask and work in a fast-paced environment.

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Digital Agency Tokyo is looking for a creative UX/UI Designer to join our team in Tokyo. You will work closely with product managers and developers to design intuitive and user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or related field. Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, or Figma. Strong understanding of user-centered design principles.

title: Data Scientist
description: AI Tech Solutions is seeking a talented Data Scientist to join our team in Kyoto. You will develop machine learning models and algorithms to extract insights and drive business decisions.
requirements: Master's or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field. Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R. Experience with machine learning frameworks and data visualization tools.

title: Product Manager
description: Tech Start-up Inc. is looking for a Product Manager to lead the development of innovative software products. You will define product vision, prioritize features, and collaborate with cross-functional teams.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, Computer Science, or related field. Proven experience in product management or software development. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

title: Content Writer
description: Content Marketing Agency is seeking a talented Content Writer to join our team in Tokyo. You will create compelling and engaging content for various digital channels, including blogs, social media, and email newsletters.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in English, Journalism, Communications, or related field. Proven experience in content writing or copywriting. Excellent writing and editing skills.

title: IT Support Specialist
description: Tech Solutions Japan is hiring an IT Support Specialist in Nagoya! Join our team and provide technical assistance to end-users, troubleshoot hardware and software issues, and maintain IT infrastructure.
requirements: Associate degree or technical certification in IT or related field. Proven experience in IT support or help desk role. Strong knowledge of computer systems, networks, and troubleshooting techniques.

title: Accountant
description: Finance Consulting Group is seeking a qualified Accountant to join our team in Fukuoka. You will be responsible for financial reporting, analysis, and compliance with accounting standards and regulations.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field. CPA or equivalent certification preferred. Strong understanding of accounting principles and financial reporting.

title: HR Coordinator
description: International Corporation is hiring an HR Coordinator in Osaka! Join our HR team and support recruitment, onboarding, and employee relations activities.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field. Proven experience in HR support or administrative role. Strong organizational and communication skills.

title: Network Engineer
description: Telecommunications Inc. is seeking a skilled Network Engineer to join our team in Tokyo. You will design, implement, and maintain network infrastructure to ensure high performance and reliability.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Cisco certification (CCNA, CCNP) preferred. Experience with network protocols, security, and troubleshooting.

title: Operations Manager
description: Logistics Solutions Japan is hiring an Operations Manager in Nagoya! Join our logistics team and oversee warehouse operations, inventory management, and distribution processes.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, Logistics, or related field. Proven experience in operations management or supply chain management. Strong leadership and problem-solving skills.

title: Quality Assurance Analyst
description: Software Solutions Co. is seeking a detail-oriented Quality Assurance Analyst to join our team in Fukuoka. You will develop and execute test plans, identify defects, and ensure software quality.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. Proven experience in software testing and quality assurance. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
